title: Evenepoel Beats Back Van Aert in Fairytale Win at Brabantse Pijl: ‘Remco Killed Me in the Final Lap’
content:
Van Aert and Evenepoel go to the line in thrilling finale at Brabantse Pijl in comeback victory for the double Olympic champion.

Read the full article at Evenepoel Beats Back Van Aert in Fairytale Win at Brabantse Pijl: ‘Remco Killed Me in the Final Lap’ on Velo.
author: ahood
